title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7822.1 - Standards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7822.1 - Standards

State Regulations
(a) The building
lighting load for an existing building shall not exceed the building lighting
power budget for such existing building except as provided in subdivision (b)
of this section. (b) The building
lighting load may exceed the building lighting power budget where no available
method of reducing the building lighting load is cost effective. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7822.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
